title: Kaiju Ditan Mai Dali

synonyms: Open a Street Stall and Sell Vigorously

synopsis:
Twenty years ago, numerous "Spiritual Ruins Gates" suddenly appeared all over the world. The spiritual energy gushing out of them would awaken the supernatural powers of those who came into contact with them. These people who awakened supernatural powers were called "Spirit Warriors". Among them, the "Space series" Spirit Warriors became the strongest because of their outstanding performance in the "Beast Tide Disaster" and the scarcity of their awakening. Jiang Nan grew up in an orphanage in Jiangcheng, Lingzhou. He aspired to become the top spiritual warrior since he was a child. At the age of sixteen, he awakened the strongest and rarest space-based supernatural power, becoming the second space-based supernatural power in Lingzhou. Our story begins here...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
